name: 陳昶瑞
objective:
一、教學目標： 簡介綠建築、永續都市之各項子議題，現階段專業界對本課題之解決概念及手法，並引介綠建築、永續都市規劃設計案例。
二、教學內容：1.思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。2.綠建築、永續都市之內容。3. 引介綠建築、永續都市規劃設計案例。
schedule:
Class Schedule:
1.	Introduction to Sustainable Design Theory
2.	Sustainable Design Principles
3.	Sustainable Planning
4.	Sustainable Architecture
5.	Sustainable Landscape and Garden Design
6.	Sustainable Graphic Design
7.	Sustainable Agriculture
8.	Sustainable Technologies
9.	Midterm Exam
10.	Waste Prevention
11.	Domestic Machinery and Furniture
12.	Improvements to Heating, Ventilation and Air-Conditioning
13.	Disposable products
14.	Eco fashion and home accessories
15.	Energy/Water sector
16.	Emotionally durable design
17.	Diminishing returns and Unsustainable Investment
18.	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance		20%
Homework		30%
Semester Project	10%
Midterm Exam	20%
Final Exam		20%
materials: Kibert, C.J. (2013). Sustainable Construction: Green Building Design & Delivery, 3nd Edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
